name: 🚩 blocked 🔒
description: Task cannot proceed due to dependencies or issues.

name: 🚩 awaiting dependency ⏳
description: Waiting for another task or external dependency to complete.

name: 🚩 on hold 🛑
description: Task is temporarily paused.

name: 🚩 deferred ⏮️
description: Task is deprioritised but might be revisited later.

name: 🚩 qa needed 🧪
description: Task requires quality assurance or testing before completion.

name: 🚩 testing 🔍
description: Task is in the testing phase and awaiting validation.

name: 🚩 needs discussion 💬
description: Task requires team input or brainstorming before proceeding.

name: 🚩 awaiting feedback 📩
description: Waiting for feedback from stakeholders or team members.

name: 🚩 needs refinement 🪛
description: Task scope or details need to be clarified or broken down.

name: 🚩 needs estimation 📏
description: Task requires time or size estimation before starting.

name: 🚩 ready for deployment 🚀
description: Task is ready to be deployed to staging or production.

name: 🚩 in staging 🌐
description: Task has been deployed to a staging environment for testing.

name: 🚩 released ✅
description: Task has been deployed to production.

name: 🚩 won't fix ❌
description: Task or issue will not be addressed.

name: 🚩 duplicate 🔁
description: Task duplicates an existing issue or feature.

name: 🚩 invalid 🚫
description: Task or issue is invalid or not applicable.

name: 🚩 spike 🔬
description: Task is exploratory and involves investigation or research.

name: 👥 frontend 🎨
description: Task related to the frontend team, including UI/UX.

name: 👥 backend 🛠️
description: Task related to the backend team, including APIs and services.

name: 👥 project management 📋
description: Task related to project management, workflows, or team coordination.

name: 🏷️ ui/ux 🖼️
description: Task related to user interface or user experience design.

name: 🏷️ database 💾
description: Task involving database schema, queries, or optimization.

name: 🏷️ devops ⚙️
description: Task related to deployment pipelines, CI/CD, or infrastructure.

name: 🏷️ testing 🔍
description: Task focused on writing or updating tests (unit, integration, etc.).

name: 🏷️ performance 🏎️
description: Task related to optimising application performance or speed.

name: 🏷️ accessibility ♿
description: Task focused on improving accessibility for all users.

name: 🏷️ security 🔒
description: Task related to improving application security or fixing vulnerabilities.

name: 🏷️ api 🔗
description: Task involving API development, integration, or updates.

name: 🏷️ dependencies 🧩
description: Task related to managing or updating project dependencies.

name: 🏷️ authentication 🔐
description: Task focused on login, user authentication, or authorisation.

description: Task focused on improving error handling or reporting.
